param.name: secid
param.label: Section ID
param.description: Content section.

param.name: catid
param.label: Category ID
param.description: Content category.

param.name: usecurrentcat
param.label: Use current category?
param.description: When browsing a Category or reading an article, display articles from the same Category only.

param.name: compat
param.label: Avatar Compatibility mode
param.description: Select component compatibility mode for Avatar support.

param.name: comcompat
param.label: Comment Compatibility mode
param.description: Select component compatibility mode for Comment support.

param.name: authorid
param.label: Authors
param.description: Filter according to article authors.
param.option: Not added or modified by me

param.name: includefrontpage
param.label: Include Frontpage Articles?
param.description: Include frontpage articles?

param.name: group
param.label: One article per author?
param.description: Limit articles to one per author?

param.name: sortorder
param.label: Sort order
param.description: Article sort order.

param.name: modulehtml
param.label: Module HTML template
param.description: HTML/CSS code to draw the complete module box. The {mainarea} tag represents the article display area.

param.name: html
param.label: Main Content HTML template
param.description: HTML/CSS code to display each article. You can embedd any of the supported tags to display article information.

param.name: columns
param.label: Columns
param.description: Number of columns to show.

param.name: rows
param.label: Rows
param.description: Number of rows to show.

param.name: pages
param.label: Pages
param.description: Number of pages to show. Transition effects are enabled between page changes. Window mode is forced to one page only.

param.name: transmode
param.label: Display Style
param.description: Transition effect mode.

param.name: width
param.label: Window Width
param.description: Window width in pixels (only for Window mode).

param.name: height
param.label: Window Height
param.description: Window height in pixels (only for Window mode).

param.name: transpause
param.label: Transition pause
param.description: Pause time between transitions (in milliseconds, default: 4000).

param.name: transspeed
param.label: Transition duration
param.description: Transition duration in milliseconds (default: 1500).

param.name: transflow
param.label: Slide orientation
param.description: Starting transition orientation.

param.name: transtype
param.label: Transition type
param.description: Transition animation type.

param.name: button
param.label: Button Style
param.description: Button graphic set to use (if enabled).

param.name: avatarw
param.label: Avatar width
param.description: Avatar width (if applicable).

param.name: avatarh
param.label: Avatar height
param.description: Avatar height (if applicable).

param.name: maxtitle
param.label: Max. title length
param.description: Maximum length of {title} tag. Empty = no limit.

param.name: maxtitlesuf
param.label: Max. title suffix
param.description: Suffix to show when trimming the title.

param.name: maxintro
param.label: Max. intro length
param.description: Maximum length of {introtext} tag. Empty = no limit.

param.name: maxintrosuf
param.label: Max. intro suffix
param.description: Suffix to show when trimming the intro text.

param.name: maxtext
param.label: Max. full text length
param.description: Maximum length of {fulltext} or {rawfulltext} tags. Empty = no limit.

param.name: maxtextsuf
param.label: Max. full text suffix
param.description: Suffix to show when trimming full text.

param.name: textbrk
param.label: Full text break keyword
param.description: Display article text up to this string mark is found (including). Leave empty to display all text.

param.name: dateformat
param.label: Date format
param.description: Date format (using PHP date function). Defaulty is: Y-m-d

param.name: morehtml
param.label: 'More' Content HTML template
param.description: HTML/CSS code to display each article. You can embedd any of the supported tags to display article information.

param.name: moreqty
param.label: More titles
param.description: Offer links to more article titles.

param.name: morecols
param.label: More Columns
param.description: Number of articles to show horizontally. If number of articles is higher, multiple rows will be shown.

param.name: moretext
param.label: More legend
param.description: Legend to show in read more area.

param.name: morergb
param.label: More legend color
param.description: Legend color.

param.name: moretitle
param.label: Max. length for title text
param.description: Maximum length of {title} tag. Empty = no limit.

param.name: moretitlesuf
param.label: Max. title suffix
param.description: Suffix to show when trimming the title.

param.name: moreintro
param.label: Max. length for intro text
param.description: Maximum length of {introtext} tag. Empty = no limit.

param.name: moreintrosuf
param.label: Max. intro suffix
param.description: Suffix to show when trimming the intro text.

param.name: moremaxtext
param.label: Max. full text length
param.description: Maximum length of {fulltext} or {rawfulltext} tags. Empty = no limit.

param.name: moremaxtextsuf
param.label: Max. full text suffix
param.description: Suffix to show when trimming full text.

param.name: moretextbrk
param.label: Full text break keyword
param.description: Display article text up to this string mark is found (including). Leave empty to display all text.
